home.title: Hi! I'm Saugaat
home.description:
I am a Software Developer by day...and by night...and the next day... âˆž

Currently employed at PwC Middle East in Emerging Tech team.
This website is my "digital garden" and a compendium of the things I have learned over the past couple years.
Happy when I'm being challenged, and engaged with projects that require me to work outside my comfort and skill set.

You can read my posts, view my development guides, or contact me at saugaatallabadi@gmail.com
All views and opinions are my own and do not reflect views and opinions of PwC in any way.
